it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.powerups

Interface PowerupController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NewtonController, TagbackController, TargetingScopeController, TeleporterController

    public interface PowerupController
    Interface for the controller of a specific powerup effect.

    It only controls the effect, not the logic for selecting the powerup card and/or discarding it after usage.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean use(PersistentView view)
      Makes the player associated to given view use this powerup.

    • Method Detail

      • use

        boolean use(PersistentView view)
     throws InterruptedException
        Makes the player associated to given view use this powerup.

        At first the method checks if this powerup can be used (e.g. conditions on damage or proximity to other players), it does not check if the player has a powerup of this type.

        If the requirements to use the powerup are not met, the user will get a message notification and the method returns false.

        The return value indicates whether the player has been able to use the powerup (completely or partially) and thus if the powerup card has to be discarded or not.

        Parameters:
        view - The view of the player who uses the powerup, not null
        Returns:
        true if the powerup has been used, false if it hasn't been used
        Throws:
        CancellationException - If a request to the user gets cancelled
        InterruptedException - If the thread gets interrupted
